pkgmetadata.longdescription: Double/Debiased Machine Learning // Estimate common causal parameters using double/debiased machine learning as proposed by Chernozhukov et al. (2018) doi:10.1111/ectj.12097. 'ddml' simplifies estimation based on (short-)stacking, which leverages multiple base learners to increase robustness to the underlying data generating process.
